methods.codec: :return: (java.util.Optional<io.deephaven.parquet.table.metadata.CodecInfo>) Optional codec info for binary types
methods.specialType: :return: (java.util.Optional<io.deephaven.parquet.table.metadata.ColumnTypeInfo.SpecialType>) Optional type hint for complex types

text:
Representation class for per-column type information stored in key-value metadata for Deephaven-written Parquet
 files.
 
 Currently only used for columns requiring non-default deserialization or type selection
